ablation_experiment.name: iLLM_PD_Framework_Ablation_Study
ablation_experiment.description: Ablation study for LLM-integrated reinforcement learning road structure design framework

no_llm_parsing.description: Remove LLM semantic parsing module, using expert-preset structured parameters instead of natural language processing, but retain LLM hybrid decision guidance in PPO optimization

no_llm_guidance.description: Retain LLM semantic parsing but disable LLM hybrid decision mechanism during RL optimization, setting mixing weight beta to 0, using pure RL policy

reduced_stability.description: Retain full LLM functionality but remove or weaken training stability mechanisms: disable adaptive exploration (use fixed rate), remove network health monitoring, simplify gradient stability control

full_system.description: Complete iLLM-PD framework as control group for comparison with the three ablation variants

test_scenarios.name: Heavy-duty Highway
test_scenarios.natural_language: Asphalt pavement design for heavy-duty highway, axle load BZZ-100, design life 20 years

test_scenarios.name: Medium Subgrade Highway
test_scenarios.natural_language: Asphalt pavement design for highway with medium subgrade

test_scenarios.name: Urban Arterial Road
test_scenarios.natural_language: Asphalt pavement design for urban arterial road

test_scenarios.name: Soft Subgrade Section
test_scenarios.natural_language: Asphalt pavement design for soft subgrade section

design_safety_ratio.description: Safety factors for three key indicators based on JTG D50-2017: surface tensile stress, base tensile strain, and subgrade deflection

total_cost.description: Unit area pavement structure cost based on material unit prices

convergence_efficiency.description: Training episodes required for each variant to reach convergence

design_success_rate.description: Proportion of successful design optimizations across all test scenarios

training_stability.description: Ratio of successful episodes to total episodes, reflecting algorithm stability
